articles.author: Matthew Ward Agius
articles.title: Europe looks to shore up own defenses amid US uncertainty - DW.com
articles.description: NATO remains a vital security umbrella for Europe, but self-reliance and mutual defense was a recurring theme for the continent's leaders during the annual Munich Security Conference.
articles.content:
Europe's collective defense still relies on the NATO trans-Atlantic alliance, the EU's top diplomat told the Munich Security Conference on Sunday.
But there is an urgent need, Kaja Kallas said, for … [+6189 chars]

articles.author: Matt Ford
articles.title: Hungary: Magyar launches anti-Orban election campaign - DW.com
articles.description: Peter Magyar's opposition Tisza party is pledging to combat corruption in one of the European Union's poorest countries and reverse Budapest's pivot towards Russia.
articles.content: Hungarian opposition leader Peter Magyar launched his party's election campaign in Budapest on Sunday, vowing to end the 16-year rule of Prime Minister Viktor Orban, tackle corruption and reorientate… [+3800 chars]
